name: L'automne
storyline: At 32, it's no understatement to say Corey's life is going less-than ideal. With both the company he worked for, as well as his recent relationship breaking, we find Corey hurt and looking to regain a sense of normalcy in his life. Deciding that spending time with his family may help him center, he flies back to the sleepy college town he grew up in. What will he find when he gets back to his home turf? Well, anything can happen when the leaves start to fall.
summary: L'automne is a kinetic, linear narrative story. Summer's gone. The Leaves have fallen. Welcome to Alder Falls.
